name: Stern Pinball Arcade
description: Real pinball machines created by the world's most experienced producer of arcade-quality pinball machines can now be played on your PC. Over 10 tables including modern classics like Star Trek™, AC/DC®, and Mustang™ are available as DLC with two FREE tables to play every month!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0 and Shader Model 5.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 ghz or better. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 660 or higher.  AMD R9-270X or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.
